text: Tromen is a stratovolcano in western Argentina. It rises above the older caldera of the Volcán Negro del Tromen. ==See also== * List of volcanoes in Argentina ==References== * Global Volcanism Program: Tromen Category:Stratovolcanoes of Argentina Category:Subduction volcanoes Category:Mountains of Argentina Category:Polygenetic volcanoes Category:Volcanoes of Neuquén Province Category:Four-thousanders of the Andes
title: Tromen
